ygData.subject: Re: A holiday tradition
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry Airly, couldn t pass up a good head on collision. Bounty started sidestepping the missles from Black nightmare. It appeared to be a dance with death. one

Sorry Airly, couldn't pass up a good head on collision.

Bounty started sidestepping the missles from Black nightmare. It 
appeared to be a dance with death. one wrong step and he'd be 
roasted. A sharp blade struck him in the backside. "YEEEEEOOOOWTch" 
he screamed from the pain, He saw the bat probes aproaching and 
started running, the probes nipping at his heals, He drew two fan 
shaped blades from his side, spun and tried to slash at one of the 
bat probes. His temporal device could keep him ahead of the probes, 
it was the actual warriors he had to worry about.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> oCC: I was almost to come in to predacon's base, just you didn't 
let 
> me  post
> 
> bic:
> 
> ::blacknightmare/mantys/wespa/6 probes::
> 
> Blacknightmare cursed while she and the others bots tried to avoid 
> the shoots, she roared "ok girls against that methalic hen"
> 
> she took off and she lauched her feathers, that was metalics 
missiles 
> and sharped knifes at time, towards bounty. Bat-probes shooted 
> towards bounty to trying to bite him too. Mantys saw at wespa, the 
> insect shuggered and both took offf and shot against the invasor.  
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > (OH, I thought the newcomers at the base were whoever was with 
> > Diamond.)
> > 
> > Bounty easily evaded Darkmouses shots but in trying to get inside 
> > he'd picked up to much velosity. "BAMMMMMM" echo'd through the 
> > Predacon base as Bounty slammed head first into the door.
> > 
> > He rolled over got to his feat and transformed. "There are always 
> > other ways to get inside." he hopped backwards avoiding autogun 
> fire 
> > as he rethunk his position.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > (They haven't posted yet.)
> > > 
> > > DarkMouse:
> > > She hit the floor and rolled onto her back. She drew her gun 
and 
> > > fired on Bounty. She then jumped up and ran inside, closing th 
> > > entrance doors behind her. "That bot has lost his logic 
> circuits." 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:

was. "Nice 
> > try 
> > > > criminals but fireing on a temporal agent is a crime 
punishable 
> > by 
> > > > death, your life is forfeit." he swooped down firing eyebeams 
> > > toward 
> > > > Darkmouse as he flew toward the entrance.
> > > > 
> > > > (Where are the new arrivals?)
> > > >
